parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its hit part index). All hit points can be obtained with [[getAllHitPointsDamage]] command.
* 0: no damage
* 1: full damage

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''getHitIndex''' hitPartIndex

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be queried
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> hitPartIndex: [[Number]] - hit part index of the Hit Point

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (or, prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] when invalid input is given)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[getHitIndex]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getAllHitPointsDamage]], [[setHitIndex]], [[setHitPointDamage]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
